channel.title: Half Acre on Sip Craft Beer
channel.description: Recent content in Half Acre on Sip Craft Beer

item.title: Half Acre - Lager Town OktoberFest
item.description: “It’s a 106 miles to Chicago, we’ve got a full tank of gas, half a pack of cigarettes; it’s dark and we’re wearing sunglasses. Hit it!” - Elwood & Joliet Jake, The Blues Brothers I spent my college years in the Second City well before craft beer took over the city, at the time the only one that was there was Goose Island (the OG). The craft breweries that sprouted inside the city have made me really jealous of the current class of college students (and all the other people in general as well) who get to wander the city drinking a plethora of great craft beer.
